description:
>> Create savings account with weekly charge, 
>> Click on submit, to submit new savings application, 
>> click on Undo approval, 
>> In the modification savings page, for weekly charge - Repeats every field is not available. 
Expected:- 
>> Repeats every field should be displayed for weekly charge on the modification page.
name: Mifos X Web App - Fix Issue Where Upon Editing Existing Weekly Charge, It Doesn't Show The Repeats Every Field Hence Cannot Edit Repeats Every.
